work-item.field:
Lets assume we have to create a detailed analysis of the change request.
  • Identify all affected artifacts and link them to the change request

    Hint: Search for requirement "I as a user want to perform simple searches" and link it to your change request using link role "relates to". 




  • Search for all artifacts which are backlinked with your requirement "I as a user want to perform simple searches" to get an understanding what artefacts need to be modified or added.
  • Specify in the description of the change what needs to be changed in the affected areas
Analyse the impact of a change request
